content.content:
2 teams, in which each player has a ball, try to kick the red and yellow marker cones off the cones, which are spread out throughout the field. The first team to achieve this, is the winner.

Variation: Deploy a defender who tries to intercept the
opponent's ball, before it hits the marker cone.
content.title: Step 1: Kicking the marker

content.content:
Players: 6-10
Marker cones: 10 red and 10 yellow.
Balls: 1 ball per player.
Vests: 2 colours and enough for each team.
Cones: 24 (4 for the pitch and 20 for the game)
Distance between the cones:
- Pitch: 10 by 10 yards
- Cones with marker cones as you see fit.
content.title: Materials

content.content:
Coach players on:
- Kicking with the inside foot.
- Kicking at close range.
- Not kicking too softly.
- Retrieve the ball quickly and then kick off the next one.
content.title: Directions
